dcterms:creator: Tyler Erzberger
dcterms:description: Super Smash Bros. Melee is a competitive fighting game that has been played since its release in 2001. It allows players to choose from 25 characters and aims to knock opponents off the stage.
dcterms:title: Super Smash Bros. Melee

dcterms:creator: Vlad Firoiu
William F Whitney
Joshua B Tenenbaum
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of gameplay data from Super Smash Bros. Melee used to train a deep reinforcement learning agent that competes against the best AI in the game.
dcterms:title: Super Smash Bros. Melee (used in reinforcement learning context)

dcterms:creator: Volodymyr Mnih

Demis Hassabis
dcterms:description: The Atari 2600 games dataset is used for training reinforcement learning algorithms to achieve human-level control through deep learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Atari 2600 games

dcterms:creator: Ben Parr
Deepak Dilipkumar
Yuan Liu
dcterms:description: Melee gameplay data used to train a deep reinforcement learning agent that achieved significant performance against the toughest AI in the game.
dcterms:title: Melee gameplay data
